headline: An Outcry Grows as Native Women Keep Vanishing
abstract: For decades, with little public notice, Native women have gone missing or been found murdered. The search for Selena Not Afraid showed how much things had changed.
lead_paragraph: BIG HORN COUNTY, Mont. â€” Jackie Big Hair slept in her car for days, waking every few hours to fire up the engine and gaze at the frozen highway rest stop where her 16-year-old daughter had been reported missing.
